ARABIC: يَٰٓأُخْتَ هَٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمْرَأَ سَوْءٍ وَمَا كَانَتْ أُمُّكِ بَغِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Sister of Harun, your father was not an evil man nor was your mother an unchaste woman!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O sister of Aaron, your father was not a wicked person, nor your mother sinful!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O sister of Aaron! Your father was not an evil man, nor was your mother an unchaste woman."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Aaron's sister, your father was not a bad man nor was your mother unchaste".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “O sister of Haroon, neither was your father an evil man nor was your mother of poor conduct!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O sister of Harun! Your father was not a man who used to commit adultery, nor your mother was an unchaste woman."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O sister of Haroun! your father was not a bad man, nor, was your mother an unchaste woman.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Sister of Aaron, thy father was not a wicked man, nor was thy mother a woman unchaste.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O sister of Aaron! Thy father was not a wicked man nor was thy mother a harlot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Sister of Aaron, your father was not an evil man, nor was your mother an unchaste woman!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O sister of Harun: thy father was not a man of evil, nor was thy mother a harlot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O sister of Aaron[’s lineage]! Your father was not an evil man, nor was your mother unchaste.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O sister of Aaron! Thy father was not a man of evil, nor thy mother a woman unchaste!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O sister (i.e. the like) of Harun (Aaron) [not the brother of Musa (Moses), but he was another pious man at the time of Maryam (Mary)]! Your father was not a man who used to commit adultery, nor your mother was an unchaste woman."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O sister of Aaron, your father was never an evil man, nor was your mother unchaste'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O sister of Aaron, your father was not an evil man, and your mother was not a whore.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O sister of Aaron, your father was not a man of evil, nor was your mother unchaste."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:28] O sister of Aaron — he was a righteous man, in other words [what is meant is], O you who are like him in [terms of] chastity — your father was not a wicked man, that is, a fornicator, nor was your mother unchaste’, that is, a fornicatress: so how is it that you have this child?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Oh sister of Aaron!) you who resembles Aaron in worship-Aaron was a righteous man, one of the best among people-; and it is also said that Aaron was an evil man and so they compared her to him; and it is also said that Aaron was her half brother from her father side. (Your father was not a wicked man) your father was not an adulterer (nor was your mother a harlot) nor was your mother a whore.
